item.title: Server restart?
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

[code]closeListener();
runserver();
}

public void runserver()
{
try
{
String File = “run.bat”; // File specified
String Dir = “./”+File; // Directory specified
Runtime.getRuntime().exec(Dir);
}
catch (IOException ioe)
{
ioe.printStackTrace();
}
}
public void closeListener()
{
try {
server.shutdownClientHandler = true;
if(server.clientListener != null) server.clientListener.close();
server.clientListener = null;
}
catch(java.lang.Exception __ex)
{
__ex.printStackTrace();
}
}[/code]

Why doesn’t my listener close, and my run.bat open?

Read full topic
